item.title: E Is For Editor Envy
item.description: I love it when I find out about a cool new tool. In this case, it is E, a Windows clone of the ubiquitous Mac text editor TextMate. Looks like this project has been around for awhile, but I just heard of it thanks to a blog entry about creating a Mac-like environment under Windows. Installing E is not a small task, although it is not a difficult one. This is due to the fact that E relies heavily on Cygwin to support “bundles” which is how TextMate creates their oh-so-useful macro and template collections.
